name: Number Magic (Carrot)
description:
Magia de números is an incredibly addictive logic game where you have to place all the numbers in order by following a very easy grouping process. Here, you will have to put your brain to the test to find the right formula that will help you place all the numbers in their correct position. What level are you able to reach?

It is easy to understand how Magia de números works. The board is divided into grids where each corner has a number. Your mission is to order these numbers one by one, starting with the number one and finishing with the highest number available. All the grids have a number in each corner, and every time you move a number, the four of them will rotate like the hands of a clock.

Although the gameplay might look difficult, it is easier than you think. All you need is a few seconds' practice to understand it. Magia de números's difficulty will increase with each level, and getting a good time score will become harder. The game is divided into three difficulty ratings: easy, medium and hard. However, you can start from any of these without having to complete the others.

Once you have put all of the numbers on the board in order, the timer will stop and your score will go straight to the player ranking. Get as high as you can and crush hundreds of other people who have put their logic skills to the test. Enjoy hours of fun solving puzzles and become the number one ranked worldwide.
